title: Harvard CS50 web programming with python
description: Harvard's CS50 Web Programming with Python and JavaScript course provides a comprehensive introduction to web development, building upon the foundational knowledge from CS50x.

title: Intel oneAPI Hackathon
description: The Intel oneAPI Hackathon is a 30-hour offline event where developers compete to build innovative solutions using Intel's oneAPI programming model and heterogeneous computing.

title: AWS Machine Learning Foundation
description: This course, offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS), introduces students to AI/ML concepts, helps them understand how to apply ML services, and prepares them to label, build, train, and deploy ML models.

title: AWS Cloud Foundation
description: AWS Cloud Foundation is a structured, scalable, and secure environment that organizations build on AWS to support their cloud adoption and growth.
